name: Civic
introduce:
Civic is a web3 digital identity solutions for crypto-native communities, NFT platforms & marketplaces, and DAOs. Civic Pass is Civic's flagship identity management product hat a dApp provider can use as an input to their compliance program.
Civic Pass enables decentralized apps (dApps) to restrict access to their offerings by vetting users in a way that protects users’ privacy while giving dApp creators and users the freedom to use a dApp with the knowledge that all other participants have passed KYC or liveness criteria.
